category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_deactivate_update_structure
preference.preference_description: Manages structure updates for documents that do not match criteria defined by this preference. By default, structure is updated for all documents. Possible values : NONE = Update structure for all documents CATALOG_COMP = Do not update structure for documents referenced in a catalog
